```{r ggplot theme, echo=FALSE}
theme_set(theme_minimal() +
  theme(
    axis.line = element_line(colour = "black"),
    axis.ticks = element_line(colour = "black"),
    axis.text = element_text(colour = "black"),
    panel.border = element_rect(colour = "black", fill=NA)
  ))

options(width=90, scipen = 999)
```

```{r read data, echo=FALSE}
NvsC <- read_csv('C:/Users/Sperber/Desktop/mscthesis/forR/Discon_NvsCtidy.csv')

```

```{r plot behav}

behav %>%
  ggplot(
    aes(
      x = Test, 
      y = BehavScore,
      color = Group,
      fill = Group
    )
  ) + geom_boxplot(alpha = 0.5) +
  scale_color_manual(
    values = c("palegreen3","orange","darkgreen","darkorange2")
  ) + scale_fill_manual(
    values = c("palegreen3","orange","darkgreen","darkorange2")
  )

```

```{r plot performance}

NvsC %>%
  ggplot(
    aes(
      x = Correct,
      y = 1,
      color = Label,
      fill = Label
    )
  ) + geom_jitter(
    width = 0.2,
    size = 3,
    alpha = 0.6
  ) +
  scale_x_discrete(
    labels = c("steelblue","Non-Neglect")
  ) + scale_color_manual(
    values = c("steelblue", "darkred")
  )
```
